title: Looking of Old Judge or Mayo Louisville players
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking of Old Judge or Mayo Louisville players
posts.post_content:
Posted By: William Turner
Hello, I am looking for  Old Judge or Mayo Louisville Players.  I would like to own at least one just for the sake of having a piece of major league baseball history from kentucky.  If anyone has any low grade examples of any Louisville players they would like to sell please let me know.  I will have some extra money within the next few days so if you could email me scans and price's I would appreciate it and try to get the money together to send a money order as soon as possible.


Thanks William.  Email is wacturer@hotmail.com
